name: fusion1-s-hyphigh-sortediou-p2
Command: cd ~/code/yolov5/;~/miniconda3/envs/yolov5/bin/python -m torch.distributed.run --nproc_per_node 4 train.py --batch 64 --img 1280 --epochs 100 --data data/qianhai_clean_add0616_public_bdd100k.yaml --weights weights/yolov5s.pt --hyp data/hyps/hyp.qianhai-high.yaml --cfg models/qianhai_yolov5s_p2.yaml --sync-bn --device 0,1,2,3 --sorted-iou --name fusion1-s-hyphigh-sortediou-p2 --exist-ok
